###################
 ploteccomposition
###################

*ploteccomposition* shows EC composition (ECRH and ECCD profiles)

**************************
 Syntax ploteccomposition
**************************

   .. command-output:: ploteccomposition -h

***************************
 Example ploteccomposition
***************************

   .. code-block:: bash

        $ ploteccomposition --uri "imas:mdsplus?user=public;pulse=134173;run=2326;database=TEST;version=3"

   .. image:: _static/images/ploteccomposition.png
      :alt: image not found
      :align: center
